text: John Elvet was an English priest in the late 14th and early 15th centuries. Elvet was born in Durham and was in the service of John of Gaunt.University of Leicester The Master of the Jewel Office,, he was Archdeacon of Leicester from 1392 to 1404. He was succeeded as Archdeacon by his brother Richard. == Notes == ==Also see== * Diocese of Lincoln * Diocese of Peterborough * Diocese of Leicester * Archdeacon of Leicester Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:14th-century English people Category:15th-century English people Category:People from Durham, England
title: John Elvet
